node.title: A chance encounter
node.excerpt:
last evening whilst eating our dinner on the hotel patio a fellow biker approached us and said are you the three on the Cub 50’s? We said yes that’s us, he explained he’d ridden from Kendal that morning stopping a Carlisle’s McDonald’s drive through for breakfast where the hostess had told him about us. Dee …

node.title: Monkey fettling his broken Cub and other day one images
Day One
node.excerpt:
An excellent first day albeit with some minor discretions, 160 miles ridden with the following events in order of occurrence. 0730 Depart Complete Engineering Services Ltd. 0800 Arrive Blood Bikes HQ at Port Road, Carlisle where Dee was interviewed by BBC Radio Cumbria. 0830ish depart Carlisle with a Blood Bikes Escort to the City limits …
